Standards._Structure:
This is the structure of a LevelProperty as expected by the parseLevelProperties() Each level root node will have as tag the name of the level itslef.
Boolean : True
Float in Seconds Enum (MyBackgrounds) Boolean ...
readSections() expected starting point. a sequence of sections and (eventually) a commonProperty
Section. This will have the same structure of the nodes below. Each following "section" node will start as this. It does not need to be complete.
a Section node as expected by readSectionProperty()
Enum (MyBackgrounds)
Box Box SubBox of Physical
Sequence of Boxes (SubBox of Physical) vd. MultiZone constructor Box ...
Should this tag exists gravity is always completely overwritten Float Float if Null is linked to accelerometer
Float Float
Float Float
Float Float
GameObj_Properties (see in go_properties_std.xml) can be partially overwitten
Should this tag exists the list is always completely overwritten This is the expected structure of a list of game objects as required by readGOList().
It can admit 2 typed of nodes: a list that as a common structure, which all the following will modify as requested.
P.S. Gently note that nested commonPropertyLists are allowed However, only the first commonProperty node of the tree will have its name read.
GameObj_Properties, does not require to be standard
.. Recursive call.. ...
... GameObj_Properties ...
... This is inside gameObjects but is a different field Box Int
Int Game Object ...
...
GameObj_Properties
GameObj_Properties
GameObj_Properties
Box All floor objects inside this box will have their isEnd set to true
Int Defines how many objects won't have health component after 1 that does.
right now it is not implemented to support commonProperties..
GameObj_Properties Float Float Float Float degrees Bool
...
Bool False will be constant True will be percentage
Float
Box Int Int milliseconds Int This will not support List reading in order to mantain the objects as simple as possible and the inner structure an arrray.
could be changed.. I will put the name of the std properties here just to make it easier to read GameObj_Properties
...
...
...
Float in Seconds Enum (MyBackgrounds) Boolean ...
Standards._CreditsStructure:
This is the structure of Credits as expected by the parseCreditsProperties()
Float in Seconds Enum (MyBackgrounds) Boolean ...
Usually one scene Float in Seconds Enum (MyBackgrounds) Boolean ...
Float in Seconds Enum (MyBackgrounds) Boolean ...
